metaTags.metaDescription: Welcome to the Cloudflare Security Week hub. See our Security Week announcements, product launches, and Cloudflare TV events all in one place.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Mon3/22- Blog Post - Intro
resourceList.resourceTitle: Welcome to Security Week 2021
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Read Matthew Prince's blog about why we've started Security week and a sneak peek at this week's announcements.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Mon 3/22-Magic WAN & Magic Firewall: secure network connectivity as a service
resourceList.resourceTitle: Secure network connectivity as a service
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Learn how Magic WAN and Magic Firewall work together to enforce network firewall policies at the edge, across traffic from any entity within the corporate network.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Press Release-Mon 3/22-MagicWan
resourceList.resourceTitle: Press Release: Cloudflare Reinvents the Corporate Network to Speed Up, Simplify, and Secure How Any Business Connects to the Internet
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Introduces Magic WAN as an alternative to legacy corporate networks that's secure, flexible, faster, and a fraction of the price

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Mon 3/22-Announcing Network On-ramp Partners for Cloudflare One
resourceList.resourceTitle: Announcing Network On-ramp Partners for Cloudflare One
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Today, we're excited to announce our newest Network On-ramp Partnerships for Cloudflare One.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Cloudflare.tv-3/22 - Security Week Product Discussion: Network Security
resourceList.resourceTitle: Security Week Product Discussion: Magic WAN & Magic Firewall
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description:
Learn more about about Magic WAN and Magic Firewall on the Cloudflare Blog .

Presented by: Patrick Donahue, Annika Garbers, Achiel van der Mandele, Evan Johnson

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Tue 3/23-New device security partnerships for Cloudflare One
resourceList.resourceTitle: New device security partnerships for Cloudflare One
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Cloudflare launches new integrations with device security partners CrowdStrike, SentinelOne, and VMware Carbon Black to further secure access to corporate applications with Cloudflare for Teams.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Tue 3/23-Anatomy of a Targeted Ransomware Attack
resourceList.resourceTitle: Anatomy of a Targeted Ransomware Attack
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Imagine your most critical systems suddenly stop operating, bringing your entire business to a screeching halt. And then someone demands a ransom to get your systems working again.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog Tue 3/23-Announcing antivirus in Cloudflare Gateway
resourceList.resourceTitle: Announcing antivirus in Cloudflare Gateway
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Today we're announcing support for malware detection and prevention directly from the Cloudflare edge, giving Gateway users an additional line of defense against security threats.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Tue 3/23-Browser Isolation for teams of all sizes
resourceList.resourceTitle: Browser Isolation for teams of all sizes
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Protecting endpoints from browser-born zero-day attacks and malware with remote browser isolation is now easy for teams of any size.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Cloudflare.tv-Tue 3/23-Security Week Product Discussion: Ransomware
resourceList.resourceTitle: Security Week Production Discussion: Browser Isolation and Gateway Malware Scanning
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Presented by: Patrick Donahue, Tim Obezuk, Malavika Tadeusz, James Espinosa, Sam Rhea

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Cloudflare.tv-Tue 3/23-Security Week Fireside Chat: Geoff Huston & Richard Leaning
resourceList.resourceTitle: Security Week Fireside Chat: Geoff Huston & Richard Leaning
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description:
In this Cloudflare TV Security Week segment, Richard Leaning will host a fireside chat with Geoff Huston, Chief Scientist, APNIC.

Presented by: Richard Leaning, Geoff Huston

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Wed 3/24-Protecting your APIs from abuse and data exfiltration
resourceList.resourceTitle: Protecting your APIs from abuse and data exfiltration
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: API Shield is growing with new functionalities: Schema Validation generally available, Managed IP List, more controls to manage certificates and Data Loss Prevention.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Wed 3/24-Data Loss Prevention Using Cloudflare
resourceList.resourceTitle: Data Loss Prevention Using Cloudflare
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: The pandemic has pushed a largely remote workforce towards adopting cloud-based SaaS providers. Cloudflare One in combination with API Shield is a holistic set of solutions that provides a common point of management for a unified and consistent approach to mitigating DLP risk.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Wed 3/24-Cloudflare DLP Announcement
resourceList.resourceTitle: Announcing Cloudflare Data Loss Prevention
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Today, we're excited to announce that your team can use Cloudflare's network to build Zero Trust controls over the data in your enterprise - wherever it lives and however it moves.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Cloudflare.tv-Wed 3/24-Security Week Product Discussion: Data Loss
resourceList.resourceTitle: Security Week Product Discussion: Data Loss Prevention
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description:
Join Cloudflare's Product Management team to learn more about the products announced today during Security Week.

- Announcing Cloudflare's Data Loss Prevention platform 
- Using Cloudflare for Data Loss Prevention 
- Protecting your APIs from abuse and data exfiltration 

Presented by: Patrick Donahue, Sam Rhea, Daniele Molteni, Misha Yalavarthy

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Cloudflare.tv-Wed 3/24-Security Week Fireside Chat: Brian Rutledge & Vijay Chauhan

topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description:

Presented by: Vijay Chauhan, Brian Rutledge

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Thu 3/25-Page Shield: Protect User Data In-Browser
resourceList.resourceTitle: Page Shield: Protect User Data In-Browser
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Today we're excited to introduce Page Shield, a client-side security product customers can use to detect attacks in end-user browsers.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Thu 3/25-Route Leak Detection
resourceList.resourceTitle: Route Leak Detection
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Today, we're excited to announce Route Leak Detection, a new network alerting feature that tells customers when a prefix they own that is onboarded to Cloudflare is being leaked.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Cloudflare.tv-Thu 3/25-Security Week Fireside Chat: Ken Breeman & Vijay Chauhan
resourceList.resourceTitle: Security Week Fireside Chat: Ken Breeman & Vijay Chauhan
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description:
In this Cloudflare TV Security Week segment, Vijay Chauhan will host a fireside chat with Ken Breeman, Technical Lead, HubSpot.

Presented by: Vijay Chauha, Ken Breeman

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Cloudflare.tv-Tue 3/25-Security Week Product Discussion: Client Side Protection from L3 to L7
resourceList.resourceTitle: Security Week Product Discussion: Client Side Protection from L3 to L7
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description:
Join Cloudflare's Product Management team to learn more about the products announced today during Security Week.

- Page Shield: Protect User Data In-Browser 
- Protecting Cloudflare Customers from BGP Insecurity with Route Leak Detection 

Presented by: Patrick Donahue, Justin Zhou, David Tuber, Andres Marisca

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Cloudflare.tv-Thu 3/25-Security Week Fireside Chat: Marco Boniardi & Vijay Chauhan
resourceList.resourceTitle: Security Week Fireside Chat: Marco Boniardi & Vijay Chauhan
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description:
In this Cloudflare TV Security Week segment, Vijay Chauhan will host a fireside chat with Marco Boniardi, Head of Security Engineering, LastMinute Group.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-CloudflareTV-Fri 3/26-Security Week Fireside Chat: Arianna Willett & Ling Wu
resourceList.resourceTitle: Security Week Fireside Chat: Arianna Willett & Ling Wu
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description:
In this Cloudflare TV Security Week segment, Ling Wu will host a fireside chat with Arianna Willett, Senior Director, Security Risk & Trust, Okta.

Presented by: Ling Wu, Arianna Willett

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Fri 3/26-Super Bot Fight Mode
resourceList.resourceTitle: Super Bot Fight Mode
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Beginning immediately, any Cloudflare user with a Pro or Business site can take new action against bots. We've added advanced features in the dashboard and some exciting updates to analytics.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Fri 3/26-Announcing API Abuse Protection
resourceList.resourceTitle: Announcing API Abuse Detection
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Today, we are announcing early access to API Abuse Detection. This technology will identify, secure, and protect API endpoints with unsupervised learning.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Fri 3/26 - Mitigating Bot Attacks against Cloudflare
resourceList.resourceTitle: Mitigating Bot Attacks against Cloudflare
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: The word "bots" on the Internet is a fairly loaded one. My earliest 'bot' experience was on IRC, where bots were quite helpful in making sure your favorite channel didn't get taken over by malicious users and allowed for fun games of trivia.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-CloudflareTV-Fri 3/26-Hacker Time
resourceList.resourceTitle: Hacker Time
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description:
This week's guest is Scott Piper, AWS Security Lead, Aurora. Scott Piper ran an AWS security consulting business for the past 3.5 years until he recently started working at Aurora, a self-driving vehicle company, to lead AWS security efforts.

Presented by: Evan Johnson, Scott Piper

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Cloudflare.tv-Fri 3/26-Security Week Fireside Chat: Michael Coates, Nate Lee & Joe Sullivan
resourceList.resourceTitle: Security Week Fireside Chat: Michael Coates, Nate Lee & Joe Sullivan
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description:
Michael Coates, Co-founder & CEO at Altitude Networks | Former CISO @Twitter  
Nate Lee, CISO at TradeShift

resourceList.resourceTitle: Security Week Product Discussion: Automated Abuse Mitigation
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description:
Join Cloudflare's Product Management team to learn more about the products announced today during Security Week.

- Introducing Super Bot Fight Mode 
- Mitigating Bot Attacks against Cloudflare 
- Announcing API Abuse Detection 

Presented by: Sergi Isasi, Ben Solomon, Thomas Vissers

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Cloudflare.tv-Fri 3/26-Security Week Fireside Chat: Joseph Mente & Vijay Chauhan
resourceList.resourceTitle: Security Week Fireside Chat: Joseph Mente & Vijay Chauhan
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Joseph Mente, Engineering Manager DevOps & IT Operations at DroneDeploy

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Sat 3/27-Advanced Certificate Manager
resourceList.resourceTitle: Introducing: Advanced Certificate Manager
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: A few years ago, we launched Dedicated Certificates. Today, we are excited to announce that dedicated certs are getting an upgrade… and a new name… introducing Advanced Certificate Manager! Advanced Certificate Manager is a flexible and customizable way to manage your certificates on Cloudflare.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Sat 3/27-Keyless SSL now supports FIPS 140-2 L3 hardware security module (HSM) offerings from all major cloud providers
resourceList.resourceTitle: Keyless SSL now supports FIPS 140-2 L3 hardware security module (HSM) offerings from all major cloud providers
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Private encryption keys stored in hardware security module offerings from all major cloud providers can now be used to secure HTTPS connections at Cloudflare's global edge.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Sat 3/27-Heartbleed Revisited
resourceList.resourceTitle: Heartbleed Revisited
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: In 2014, a bug was found in OpenSSL, a popular encryption library used to secure the majority of servers on the Internet. This bug allowed attackers to abuse an obscure feature called TLS heartbeats to read memory from affected servers.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Mon 3/29-A new Cloudflare Web Application Firewall
resourceList.resourceTitle: A new Cloudflare Web Application Firewall
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: Today we are announcing a new Cloudflare Web Application Firewall for all Cloudflare paid zone customers.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Cloudflare.tv-3/29 - Security Week Product Discussion: Private Key Extraction
resourceList.resourceTitle: Security Week Product Discussion - SSL/TLS Product Announcements & Private Key Handling
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description:
Join Cloudflare's Product Management team to learn more about the products announced today during Security Week. The PMs will talk about the problems they're solving for customers, what's available today, and what's coming soon.

Presented by: Patrick Donahue, Dina Kozlov, Nick Sullivan

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Cloudflare.tv-3/29 - Security Week Product Discussion 2
resourceList.resourceTitle: Security Week Product Discussion: A New Cloudflare WAF
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description:
Join Cloudflare's Product Management team to learn more about the products announced today during Security Week. The PMs will talk about the problems they're solving for customers, what's available today, and what's coming soon.

Patrick Donahue, Michael Tremante, Nafeez Ahamed

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-CloudflareTV-Tue 3/30-Security Week Product Discussion
resourceList.resourceTitle: Security Week Product Discussion: Account Takeover Protection
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description:
## 8:30–9:30am PT

Join Cloudflare's Product Management team to learn more about the products announced today during Security Week. The PMs will talk about the problems they're solving for customers, what's available today, and what's coming soon.

Presented by: Patrick Donahue, Michael Tremante, Julie Sparks, Kenny Johnson

resourceList.title: SecurityWeek-Blog-Tue 3/30-Build Zero Trust rules with managed devices
resourceList.resourceTitle: Build Zero Trust rules with managed devices
topic: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce
resourceList.description: Starting today, your team can use Cloudflare Access to build rules that only allow users to connect to applications from a device that your enterprise manages. You can combine this requirement with any other rule in Cloudflare's Zero Trust platform, including identity, multifactor method, and geography.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Tue 3/30-End User Security: Account Takeover Protections with Cloudflare
resourceList.resourceTitle: End User Security: Account Takeover Protections with Cloudflare
topic: Secure Teams, Devices, and Internal Applications
resourceList.description: End user account security is always a top priority, but a hard problem to solve. In this post we provide a summary of all the Cloudflare features that can help.

resourceList.title: SecurityWk-Blog-Tue 3/30-Inside Cloudflare: Preventing Account Takeovers
resourceList.resourceTitle: Inside Cloudflare: Preventing Account Takeovers
topic: Accelerate Internet Applications
resourceList.description: Over the last week, Cloudflare has published blog posts on products created to secure our customers from credential stuffing _bots_, detect users with compromised credentials, and block users from proxy services. But what do we do inside Cloudflare to prevent account takeovers on _our_ own applications?
